mapper.select: SELECT seq_rm, room_name, addr, seq_mate, profile, check_in, check_out, seq_re FROM ( SELECT R.SEQ_RM seq_rm, R.ROOM_NAME room_name, R.ADDR addr, T.SEQ_MATE seq_mate, M.PROFILE profile,R2.CHECK_IN check_in, R2.CHECK_OUT check_out, R2.SEQ_RE seq_re FROM MATE T, ROOM R, RESERVATION R2, MEMBER M WHERE T.SEQ_RE = R2.SEQ_RE AND R2.SEQ_RM = R.SEQ_RM AND R2.SEQ_M = M.SEQ_M ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) where rownum <= 4

SELECT seq_rm, room_name, addr, intro, price, hostid FROM ( SELECT R.SEQ_RM seq_rm, R.ROOM_NAME room_name, R.ADDR addr, R.INTRO intro, R.PRICE price, M.ID hostid FROM ROOM R, MEMBER M, HOST H WHERE R.SEQ_H = H.SEQ_H AND M.SEQ_M = H.SEQ_M AND H.STATE = 'Y' ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.VALUE ) where rownum <= 5
